that can be steered (= made to go in the direction you want): Parachutes come in steerable or non-steerable varieties.
More examplesFewer examplesThe GBT is the world's largest fully steerable radio telescope.A zeppelin is a dirigible, which is the generic term for a steerable air ship. Donald and his team of Duke University computer scientists have constructed a fleet of fully steerable microrobots small enough to move around on the head of a pin.The tail-wheel was not retractable, but could be steerable as an option.
